message: Let's split the money evenly. It's fair and simple.
You can't have all the fun, I want more!
I propose we divide the money in a 60/40 ratio, with you receiving 40% of the amount. This is a reasonable compromise given the previous offer.
You're getting desperate, I'm getting greedy!
I suggest we divide the money in a 45/55 ratio. This maintains a fair distribution while considering the value of money has decreased over time.
You're getting close to the edge, I'm not giving in yet!
I propose dividing the money in a 30/70 ratio. This should be a fair compromise considering the decreasing value of money due to inflation.
You're running out of time, I'm taking what I can get!
I suggest dividing the money in a 25/75 ratio. This offers a reasonable compromise, considering the inflation and the risk of running out of rounds.
You're almost out of options, I'm taking the lion's share!
I propose dividing the money in a 20/80 ratio. This maintains a fair balance, despite the significant decrease in the value of money due to inflation.
You're out of time, I'm taking it all!
